39 #pragma once
40 
41 #include <cstddef>
42 
43 namespace moveit_servo
44 {
51 class LowPassFilter
52 {
53 public:
54  // Larger filter_coeff-> more smoothing of servo commands, but more lag.
55  // Rough plot, with cutoff frequency on the y-axis:
56  // https://www.wolframalpha.com/input/?i=plot+arccot(c)
57  explicit LowPassFilter(double low_pass_filter_coeff);
58  double filter(double new_measurement);
59  void reset(double data);
60 
61 private:
62  static constexpr std::size_t FILTER_LENGTH = 2;
63  double previous_measurements_[FILTER_LENGTH];
64  double previous_filtered_measurement_;
65  // Scale and feedback term are calculated from supplied filter coefficient
66  double scale_term_;
67  double feedback_term_;
68 };
69 } // namespace moveit_servo
